Activate:Chi's Biden Promise Tracker!

We're keeping track of the Biden Administration's progress fulfilling their first 100 days campaign promises. Follow along and help us hold them accountable.

Total promises

7

Not yet started

3

In progress

4

Completed

0
Name
Status
Status description

  • Push for immediate coronavirus legislation

    Biden Administration has been pushing to use Budget Reconcilliation to pass COVID Stimulus

    Last updated: February 22 | ref

    In progress

  • Stop Family Separation at the U.S.-Mexico Border

    Created a Task Force to Reunify Families, however ICE is going "rogue" with many orders.

    Last updated: February 21 | ref

    In progress

  • Extend the Voting Rights Act

    There are currently bills in progress to strengthen the Voting Rights Act, specifcally the "For the People Act" and the "John Lewis Voting Rights Advancement Act" however there has been no concrete movement on them yet. See the ACLU website provided for the ways the Biden Administration can strengthen voting rights in America.

    Last updated: February 21 | ref

    In progress

  • Assemble a coronavirus task force during his presidential transition

    Task force has been created.

    Last updated: February 18 | ref

    In progress

  • Raising the Minimum Wage to $15

    The Raise the Wage Act of 2021 would gradually raise the federal minimum wage to $15 an hour by 2025 but does not currently have enough votes to pass.

    Last updated: February 21 | ref

    Not started

  • Repair Alliances and Plan a Global Summit for Democracy

    Though the Summit for Democracy is still planned on, there are major challenges to both it's implementation and whether it will be useful and effective.

    Last updated: February 21 | ref

    Not started

  • Increase Police Reform

    Biden has spoken about creating a National Police Oversight Board however also proposed investing $300 million more in police for better training. No definite plans have been made.

    Last updated: February 21 | ref

    Not started
